question: What will be the price of Ethereum (ETH/USD) on [DATE]?
description: Predict Ethereum's price at market resolution. Current price: $[CURRENT_PRICE]
resolutionCriteria:
This market resolves using the Ethereum (ETH/USD) price reported by CoinGecko at [TIME] UTC on [DATE].

The final price will be floored to the nearest dollar for settlement.
Only the CoinGecko API will be used as the data source.
In case of any downtime, the last available price before resolution will be used.
Market range: $[MIN_VALUE_FORMATTED] - $[MAX_VALUE_FORMATTED]
_comment_image: Optional: Upload image first using POST /api/markets/upload-image, then add the URL and key here
